getAll: select heroId, name, yearOfBirth, superproperty, costume from superhero
get: select name, yearOfBirth, superpropert, costume from superhero where heroId=?
insert: insert into superhero(heroId, name, yearOfBirth, superproperty, costume) values(?,?,?,?,?)
update: update superhero set name=?, yearOfBirth=?, superproperty=?, costume=? where heroId=?
